## Events.BlockChange.setDisabledReason() method

Set the language-neutral identifier for the reason why the block was or was not disabled. This is only valid for events where element is 'disabled'. Defaults to 'MANUALLY\_DISABLED'.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setDisabledReason(disabledReason: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  disabledReason | string | The identifier of the reason why the block was or was not disabled. |

**Returns:**

void
